EmailTemplate.name: IPRD Approval Template
EmailTemplate.subject: IP Request - {!CMOS_BU_IP_Request__c.Name} has been Approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!CMOS_BU_IP_Request__c.CreatedBy},
Your IP Request {!CMOS_BU_IP_Request__c.Name} submitted on {!CMOS_BU_IP_Request__c.CreatedDate} has been approved.
Please contact the IP team for further information or review the original IP submission.
